```{r}
meteorites <- read_csv("clean_data/meteorites.csv")
```

```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  arrange(desc(mass_g)) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  filter(fall == "Found") %>% 
  select(name, year) %>% 
  head(10)
  
```

```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  group_by(fall) %>% 
  summarise(average_mass = mean(mass_g))
```

```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  filter(year >= 2000) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(number_of_meteorites = n())
```

```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  group_by(fall) %>% 
  summarise(count = n(),
            avg_mass = mean(mass_g))
```
